behaviorProtocol.description: Please list all protocols for this project.

description.title: Description
description.description: Enter a description of this behavioral protocol.

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter a descriptive name for this behavioral protocol.

describedIn.title: Described in
describedIn.description: Enter a link to a publication that describes this behavioral protocol.

internalIdentifier.title: Internal identifier
internalIdentifier.description: Enter the identifier (or label) of this behavioral protocol that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this behavioral protocol.

stimulationIntro.title: Stimulation
stimulationIntro.description: Add all stimulation approaches and/or techniques used within this behavioral protocol.
